title: Big Brother Blindness, RuPaul: Frack Queen 3.18.20
itunes:title: Big Brother Blindness, RuPaul: Frack Queen 3.18.20
description:
In episode 589, Jack and Miles are joined by Bechdel Cast's Jamie Loftus to discuss how the media is finally starting to take Covid-19 seriously, mental health, Wall Street Journal blaming young people for everything going on, the remaining primaries, Big Brother Germany, Jared Leto, RuPaul fracking, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Civilization, Interrupted
  2. How to Care for Your Mental Health During the Coronavirus Lockdown
  3. A Generational War Is Brewing Over Coronavirus
  4. Ohio voting postponed but other primaries today go on despite coronavirus risks
  5. Big Brother Contestants Have No Idea What the Hell Is Going on Out Here 
  6. Wow. 12 days ago I began a silent meditation in the desert. We were totally isolated. No phone, no communication etc. We had no idea what was happening outside the facility.
  7. Amid *Waves Hands* All This, RuPaul May Be Fracking
  8. WATCH: Sia - Paranoid Android (Radiohead cover)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
